import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, Navigate, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Adminlogin() { const[name,setName]= useState("") const[pass,setPass]= useState("") let navigate = useNavigate(); function submit() { if (name==="admin" && pass==="admin") { localStorage.setItem("name",name) localStorage.setItem("pass",pass) navigate("/") } else { alert("Something Went Wrong") } // localStorage.setItem(, "value") } return (
